channel.title: Massive FPS drops on certain savegames
channel.description:
I ran into this issue a couple of times throughout the game but I didn't really reproduce it until the very end (because I could progress anyway).
Basically, at the very end, in the teleporter room, my FPS is fine, but if I save the game when the aliens are about to start spawning and then reload that save then my framerate is f***ed. It got to be quite annoying because when I died I had to revert back to the autosave and watch the whole teleporter start-up sequence again. I tried saving both from the menu and with a quicksave but it didn't have any effect.

item.title: Massive FPS drops on certain savegames
item.dc:creator: Freeman42
item.description:
Console example:

Loading game from //MOD/SAVE/bm_c1a1e.HL1...
Error! Variable "$detail" is multiply defined in material "models/xenians/houndeye/houndeye"!

item.source: Massive FPS drops on certain savegames

item.title: Massive FPS drops on certain savegames
item.dc:creator: Freeman42
item.description:
Hi,
Same problems of “late precache”, game run smoothly on my i7 2600k / 6Gb of RAM / HD5850, but sometimes i’ve some freezes due to these, it makes me crazy :’(
No tried Episode 1 or 2, or even HL2 main campaign (i’ve just reinstalled it for BMS ). Mod bugs of Source problems?

Read full topic
item.source: Massive FPS drops on certain savegames

item.title: Massive FPS drops on certain savegames
item.dc:creator: mahalingam
item.description:
I have this “late precache” problem too. The game hangs for a second at the moment a creature dies. It happens only once with each new enemy on every new level.
btw HL2, EP1/2 run smoothly.

Read full topic
item.source: Massive FPS drops on certain savegames

item.title: Massive FPS drops on certain savegames
item.dc:creator: fulis
item.description:
Now that you mentioned it, there’s a load of stuff.
My specs are Q6600, GTX260, WinXP SP3 (I think)

Loading game from SAVE\quick.sav…
SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_lambda/c3a2e_longjumpstore_interior.mdl)
Loading game from //MOD/SAVE/bm_c3a2h.HL1…
ShaderAPIDX8::CreateD3DTexture: D3DERR_INVALIDCALL
Error! Flag “$model” is multiply defined in material “models/npcs/sentry_ceiling”!
No such variable “$texture2transform” for material “models/v_rpg/rpg_screen_overlay”
Error: Material “models/v_rpg/rpg_screen_overlay” : proxy “TextureTransform” unable to initialize!
No such variable “$texture2transform” for material “models/v_egon/v_egon_screen”
Error: Material “models/v_egon/v_egon_screen” : proxy “TextureTransform” unable to initialize!
Attempted to create unknown entity type Default!
NULL Ent in UTIL_PrecacheOther

Error! Variable “$detailscale” is multiply defined in material “models/xenians/houndeye/houndeye”!
